node.title: Ellen White and Her End-Time Relevance
node.description: Discussion of Ellen White's comments on last-day events, with particular emphasis on the increasing merger of religious and political elements. Do current societal trends, weather aberrations, global economy, and acts of terrorism validate Ellen White's identification of end-time scenarios in the great controversy? This presentation focuses on Ellen White's impact on postmodern, globalized, and pluralist Adventism.
